entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
